Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

Application no. C 110260 PQX submitted by the Administration of Children’s Services and the Department of Citywide Administrative Services pursuant to Section 197-c of the New York City Charter for acquisition of property located at 629 Courtlandt Avenue (Block 2411, Lot 41) for continued use as a child care center, Community District 1, Borough of the Bronx. This application is subject to review and action by the Land Use Committee only if appealed to the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(2) of the Charter or called up by vote of the Council pursuant to §197-d (b)(3) of the Charter.
